item.title: First Post
item.description:
Getting Started with Hugo

Welcome to my first blog post! I’ve just set up this site using Hugo and the Terminal theme, and I’m really excited about how it looks.

Why Hugo?

Hugo is incredibly fast and simple to use. Here are some things I love about it:

  • Lightning fast builds - even with hundreds of pages
  • No dependencies - just a single binary
  • Great themes - like this Terminal theme!
  • Markdown support - write content naturally

Code Examples

The syntax highlighting looks great too:
